page.title: 07Amenities in Inchnadamph
page.content: Although Inchnadamph has no shops, there are many amenities available. Public services are a{post box,a tele- {phone kiosk,a refuse collection weekly from Lochinver and a{mobile library (fortnightly from Brora). The{post bus travels daily to Lairg(9.30am)and back to Lochinver(4.00pm).Post is delivered (by car)at 4.30 daily.There are weekly visits by a{doctor and nurse} from Lochinver. Visiting tradesmen are the {coalman}(weekly from Bonar bridge),the {fishmonger}(weekly from Lochinver), a {butcher}and the{milkman}(on alternate days). Milk is distributed from {Dingwall.Petrol,meals and refreshments are got at the{hotel}where there is also a{Mountain Rescue Service}and tourist information.{Caravans,camping space and{Bed and breakfast}can be had nearby. A{mobile bank}visits twice weekly from Ullapool.
